title: Local linear regression modelization when all variables are curves
abstract: A nonparametric local linear estimator of the regression function when both the response and the explanatory variables are of the functional kind is constructed. Then its rate of uniform almost-complete convergence is stated. This theoretical result will be a key tool for many further developments in nonparametric functional data analysis (FDA).

title: Estimation locale linéaire de la fonction de régression pour des variables hilbertiennes - ScienceDirect
Exact Quadratic Error of the Local Linear Regression Operator Estimator for Functional Covariates | SpringerLink
